RecycloToken","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"details":"A decentralized marketplace for trading Recyclo tokens with role-based access control","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}]},"events":{"ListingBought(uint256,address,uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when a listing is purchased","params":{"buyer":"Address of the buyer","id":"The unique identifier of the listing","quantity":"Number of items purchased"}},"ListingCancelled(uint256)":{"details":"Emitted when a listing is cancelled","params":{"id":"The unique identifier of the cancelled listing"}},"ListingCreated(uint256,address,uint256,uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when a new listing is created","params":{"id":"The unique identifier of the listing","metaHash":"Hash of the listing metadata","pricePerUnit":"Price per item in tokens","quantity":"Number of items listed","seller":"Address of the seller"}},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted to signal this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"buyListing(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Buyer must have approved sufficient tokens to the marketplace","params":{"listingId":"The ID of the listing to purchase from","quantity":"Number of items to purchase"}},"cancelListing(uint256)":{"details":"Can be called by the listing seller or admin","params":{"listingId":"The ID of the listing to cancel"}},"constructor":{"details":"Initializes the Marketplace contract","params":{"admin":"Address to be granted DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE and LISTER_ROLE","tokenAddr":"Address of the RecycloToken contract"}},"createListing(uint256,uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"Only users with LISTER_ROLE can create listings","params":{"metaHash":"Hash of off-chain metadata","pricePerUnit":"Price per item in tokens (must be > 0)","quantity":"Number of items to list (must be > 0)"},"returns":{"_0":"listingId The unique identifier of the created listing"}},"getListing(uint256)":{"params":{"listingId":"The ID of the listing to retrieve"},"returns":{"_0":"listing The complete Listing struct"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"grantListerRole(address)":{"details":"Only callable by DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE","params":{"account":"Address to grant the LISTER_ROLE to"}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. loToken.sol":{"keccak256":"0x613cdfbb9089d2dd2ccf5df58d436d71b06cbf87b989cbc23a94ebee57f1dc53","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://a7b187a29c082ad09c792cc7839224611ad5dca4b76d4398996888ca3f91a924","dweb:/ipfs/QmcLYEWgTzHSyvc7v8c5R2v8PA4fEzUgamYsyu4gEbwf8p"]}},"version":1}

buyListing(uint256,uint256).details: Buyer must have approved sufficient tokens to the marketplace

params.listingId: The ID of the listing to purchase from

cancelListing(uint256).details: Can be called by the listing seller or admin

params.listingId: The ID of the listing to cancel

params.admin: Address to be granted DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE and LISTER_ROLE

createListing(uint256,uint256,bytes32).details: Only users with LISTER_ROLE can create listings

params.pricePerUnit: Price per item in tokens (must be > 0)
params.quantity: Number of items to list (must be > 0)

returns._0: listingId The unique identifier of the created listing

params.listingId: The ID of the listing to retrieve

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

params.account: Address to grant the LISTER_ROLE to

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[ERC section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.

LISTER_ROLE().notice: Role identifier for users who can create listings

getListing(uint256).notice: Retrieves a full listing struct by ID

listingCount().notice: Counter for generating unique listing IDs

listings(uint256).notice: Mapping from listing ID to Listing struct

token().notice: The RecycloToken contract used for payments
